meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: GEAR OF WAR

div.a: U.S. Attack On Iran Would Take Hundreds Of Planes, Ships, And Missiles

div.div: Setting back Iran’s nuclear efforts will need to be an all-out effort, with squadrons of bombers and fighter jets, teams of commandos, rings of interceptor missiles and whole Navy carrier strike groups — plus enough drones, surveillance gear, tanker aircraft and logistical support to make such a massive mission go.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QqSwSb&via=Digg&text=U.S. Attack On Iran Would Take Hundreds Of Planes, Ships, And Missiles

div.div: PUNTER KICKS ASS

div.a: NFL Player Explains Gay Marriage To A Politician In The Best Way Possible

div.div: "I can assure you that gay people getting married will have zero effect on your life. They won't come into your house and steal your children. They won't magically turn you into a lustful c*ckmonster."

li.div: I don't really follow football, but @ChrisWarcraft and @brendon310 are now my favorite players because of this deadspin.com/5941348/they-wont...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NZo1id&via=Digg&text=NFL Player Explains Gay Marriage To A Politician In The Best Way Possible

div.div: HINDSIGHT

div.a: Why Didn't Sony Invent The iPod?

div.div: For a generation, Sony was the world’s most successful consumer electronics company. It developed a vision of integration of devices and content long before Apple dreamt of going into the music business.
APPLE
Based on new information, Apple will be introducing a tweaked iPod shuffle, new iPod nano, and new iPod touches.
WORLD RECORDS

div.a: Oldest Message In A Bottle Found

div.div: A Scottish skipper has found the oldest message ever in a bottle at sea, Guinness World Records said.
SO FRUSTRATING

div.a: What If Feels Like To Be Outsmarted By Food Packaging

div.div: This video of one man’s struggles to open packages is far better than that nasty letter we all formulate in our heads every time we rip apart a bag and M&M’s cascade onto the floor.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RtSci5&via=Digg&text=What If Feels Like To Be Outsmarted By Food Packaging

div.a: Hindsight More Likely To Affect Men

div.div: They say hindsight is 20/20, but apparently that's not always the case.
REAL FIRST CLASS PROBLEMS

div.a: TSA Pre-Check, Fairness And Opaque Algorithms

div.div: It took less than 30 seconds to clear security with "TSA Pre-√." It felt great. And it felt like cheating.

li.div: Sometimes you have to share just because it's so thought provoking. Measurement and analysis Vs. Command and Control? ethanzuckerman.com/blog/20...

div.div: PROBABLY A GOOD THING

div.a: Jimmy Wales Threatens To Encrypt Wikipedia If Snooping Bill Passes

div.div: Wikipedia founder Jimmy Wales has joined the opposition to the Communications Data Bill that was proposed by the UK government earlier this year.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RQPMKM&via=Digg&text=Jimmy Wales Threatens To Encrypt Wikipedia If Snooping Bill Passes

div.div: STILL MAKES NO SENSE
The RNC star breaks his silence to The Carmel Pine Cone. “Everybody had advice for me, except the janitor.”
SPACE PHOTOGRAPHY

div.a: Photos Of Astronauts Using DSLRs On Spacewalks

div.div: A series of incredible photos snapped with DSLRs during a spacewalk.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UxYcdW&via=Digg&text=Photos Of Astronauts Using DSLRs On Spacewalks

div.div: GUESS THEY REALLY DID PEAK IN HIGH SCHOOL

div.a: Popular Kids More Likely To Get Lung Cancer

div.div: A new study shows heart disease, lung cancer, and emphysema may be more prevalent in popular youths.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P4DsKf&via=Digg&text=Popular Kids More Likely To Get Lung Cancer

div.div: THE ULTIMATE DIET

div.a: Will We Ever Photosynthesize Like Plants?

div.div: The discovery that some animals have found ways to feed off the sun’s energy has led to the intriguing idea that humans could one day create solar-powered nourishment.
AMAZON VS. APPLE

div.a: Amazon To Apple: The Game Starts Now

div.div: "We want to make money when people use our devices, not when they buy our devices," said Bezos. The Kindle Fire isn't a gadget, but a store. It's also the greatest store in human history.

li.div: Great read. Amazon is building the ultimate consumption tools "Amazon to Apple: the game starts now theverge.com/2012/9/7/3298... via @verge"

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P215Bz&via=Digg&text=Amazon To Apple: The Game Starts Now

div.div: 'SORRY, I FORGOT!'

div.a: Watch This Manic Woman Incessantly Apologize As She Stops Traffic In New York

div.div: This lady stops traffic on Sixth Avenue and 22nd Street by banging on car doors and repeatedly screaming "Sorry, I forgot!"

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RQyv4r&via=Digg&text=Watch This Manic Woman Incessantly Apologize As She Stops Traffic In New York

div.div: INTERPLANETARY CHANGE

div.a: This Is Most Expensive Penny In The Universe

div.div: This is the most expensive penny in the Universe. It's now on Mars, after an exciting $2.5 billion ride.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qr5krF&via=Digg&text=This Is Most Expensive Penny In The Universe

div.div: HISTORY

div.a: Way Before 'Gangnam Style,' Gangnam Was Very Different

div.div: Gangnam is a ritzy area of Seoul and the term "Gangnam style" obviously refers to that district. However, Gangnam wasn't always galloping horse dances, tennis courts, and morning aerobics.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qhp7Mi&via=Digg&text=Way Before 'Gangnam Style,' Gangnam Was Very Different

div.div: NOT JUST AN EXCUSE

div.a: Men And Women Really Do See Things Differently

div.div: Men and women really don't see eye to eye, according to a new study.
